alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Hand (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 5:18PM MDT until April 22 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Hand County in central South Dakota... Northeastern Buffalo County in central South Dakota... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 617 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Rosehill Dam, or 22 miles south of Miller, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Rosehill Dam around 625 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Vayland and St. Lawrence. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
